description: Retrieves the account setting value for the specified setting name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the account setting, such as BASIC_SCAN_TYPE_VERSION or REGISTRY_POLICY_SCOPE.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Retrieves the name of the account setting.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The setting value for the setting name. The following are valid values for the basic scan type being used: AWS_NATIVE or CLAIR. The following are valid values for the registry policy scope being used: V1 or V2.
